segments.text: What seems to the trouble Mr Brown ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m in pretty bad shape , Doctor Ford .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No appetite , always unaged and I can ’ t sleep well .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: YES . I ’ Ve lost quite a few pounds since last month .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: when was the last time you have track up ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me take your blood pressure . You look anilic . Well , Mr.Brown . I ’ m happy to say it ’ s nothing serious . You just a little run down from overwork .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What am I suppose to do ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think you ’ ll needs just vacation . Try to get out doors more . I ’ ll be sure if you get more rest .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you , doctor . I ’ ll do what you say .
segments.speaker: S2
